text: Need Layla Campbell for Bed Bath N' Table campaign. Budget around $24,758, looking for 1 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x TV appearance, 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Twitter post. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
